column5: two ------Lesser Adjutant Storks------ were rescued from a family in Kampong Svay district
column6: Kampong Thom province during a monthly law enforcement patrol.------Officers have confirmed that birds were bought by a family for breeding purposes
column7: and not for resale. The birds were given to the Wildlife Alliance  for rehabilitation before they can be returned to their natural habitat.------The owners were educated and signed an agreement not to keep wildlife again. ------KBN
